notes.body: Hello Shiree,      Greetings from PharmEasy!  ​   With regards to your order #653805879726440448, I am sorry to know you have not received your ordered medicine UDAPA 10MG STRIP OF 10 TABLETS of 3 quantities. This is certainly not the kind of experience that we wanted you to have with our services. I apologize for the inconvenience caused to you.     I have highlighted the issue to our partner retailer. The issue is being investigated; this will take 24-48 hours from the time of reporting the issue. Once the issue is verified, we will try to initiate a refund for the missing medicines. We will inform you of the status once we receive an update from our partner retailer.     Once the refund is initiated, it will reflect in your payment source within 5-7 working days. Also, please confirm whether the order was delivered in intact condition.     I appreciate your patience in the meantime.     Regards,  Sandhya Nackwal
notes.body_html:
Hello Shiree,

Greetings from PharmEasy!
​
With regards to your order #653805879726440448, I am sorry to know you have not received your ordered medicine UDAPA 10MG STRIP OF 10 TABLETS of 3 quantities. This is certainly not the kind of experience that we wanted you to have with our services. I apologize for the inconvenience caused to you.

I have highlighted the issue to our partner retailer. The issue is being investigated; this will take 24-48 hours from the time of reporting the issue. Once the issue is verified, we will try to initiate a refund for the missing medicines. We will inform you of the status once we receive an update from our partner retailer.

Once the refund is initiated, it will reflect in your payment source within 5-7 working days. Also, please confirm whether the order was delivered in intact condition.

I appreciate your patience in the meantime.

Regards,
Sandhya Nackwal

notes.body: Hello,     Greetings from PharmEasy!   ​   I understand that you wish to raise a return request for your order #650433233888653312-50750. Please be informed, that the return validity for APIXAPIL 2.5MG STRIP OF 10 TABLETS was 15 days from the date of delivery.    Your order is delivered to you on 20th November 2025 and the return window is closed. I would have surely helped you if you have contacted us within the reporting timeframe. Hence, we will be unable to return the requested medicine or process a refund. Please accept my sincere apology for the inconvenience caused to you.   PharmEasy offers a flexible return policy for items ordered with us. Under this policy, each item purchased will have a returnable window which can vary anywhere between 0 to 7 days, post its delivery. The return window is listed in the returns section of the order, once delivered. You may check the below link to know about our return policy,  https://PharmEasy.in/help/returns-43000349468/how-does-PharmEasy-s-return-policy-work--43000220410   ​   For any further assistance, please reach out to us through our support channels in the App or website listed in the 'Need Help' section.     Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Stay Healthy.     Regards,  Manisha
notes.body_html:

Greetings from PharmEasy! 
​
I understand that you wish to raise a return request for your order #650433233888653312-50750. Please be informed, that the return validity for APIXAPIL 2.5MG STRIP OF 10 TABLETS was 15 days from the date of delivery. 

Your order is delivered to you on 20th November 2025 and the return window is closed. I would have surely helped you if you have contacted us within the reporting timeframe. Hence, we will be unable to return the requested medicine or process a refund. Please accept my sincere apology for the inconvenience caused to you.

PharmEasy offers a flexible return policy for items ordered with us. Under this policy, each item purchased will have a returnable window which can vary anywhere between 0 to 7 days, post its delivery. The return window is listed in the returns section of the order, once delivered. You may check the below link to know about our return policy,
https://PharmEasy.in/help/returns-43000349468/how-does-PharmEasy-s-return-policy-work--43000220410

For any further assistance, please reach out to us through our support channels in the App or website listed in the 'Need Help' section.

helpdesk_ticket.description:
Hi Team,

I hope you’re doing well.

I’m trying to book the *Women’s Master Checkup with Cancer & Arthritis
Screening* on PharmEasy, but the app shows that the test is *not available*
for my pin code *723101*.

Could you please confirm whether:

   1.

   This is an actual service unavailability for my location, or
   2.

   A technical issue/bug on the app?

If the test is unavailable, kindly let me know if there are any alternate
ways to book it - either through a partner lab, nearby serviceable
pincodes, or by scheduling directly through your support team.

I would really appreciate your assistance, as I’m hoping to complete this
checkup soon.

Thanks in advance,
* Shubham Sureka*

--

helpdesk_ticket.subject: Unable to Book Women’s Master Checkup – Pincode 723101
helpdesk_ticket.description_html:
Hi Team,
I hope you’re doing well.
I’m trying to book the Women’s Master Checkup with Cancer & Arthritis Screening on PharmEasy, but the app shows that the test is not available for my pin code 723101.
Could you please confirm whether:
  1. This is an actual service unavailability for my location, or
  2. A technical issue/bug on the app?
If the test is unavailable, kindly let me know if there are any alternate ways to book it - either through a partner lab, nearby serviceable pincodes, or by scheduling directly through your support team.
I would really appreciate your assistance, as I’m hoping to complete this checkup soon.
Thanks in advance,
Shubham Sureka

notes.body: Hello Shubham,     Greetings from PharmEasy!  We refer to your below mail & we  understand your query is about the service availability of location in Pincode '723101'  As per the update received on your concern, please note that we apologize for the inconvenience caused to you because you have been unable to book an appointment on the area pin code 723101 due to ​nonserviceable area .  Further we wish to inform you that currently service is unavailable at your given location, we shall try to arrange service in future  For any further assistance, please reach out to us through our support channels, in the App or website, listed in the 'Need Help' section.  Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Have a great day ahead!     Regards      Litu Behera
notes.body_html:

notes.body: Hello Kushagra,     Greetings from PharmEasy!  I understand your concern with regard to the price issue. I will surely assist you with this.     I would like to inform you that we are running the "best pricing feature", which includes a product-level discount, coupon code discount, Pharmeasy credits, and loyalty cashback (for customers enrolled in the Plus program).   Please note, when you search for any product on our portal that time the price of that product or medicine shows with the product-level discount, coupon code discount, Pharmeasy credits, and loyalty cashback (for customers enrolled in the Plus program). After adding that product to your cart, the basic product level discount will be shown without the coupon code discount. Under your cart, medicines you need to apply the coupon code to get the same discount benefits.     For any further assistance, please reach out to us through our support channels in the App or website listed in the 'Need Help' section.  Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Stay Healthy.       Regards,  Devdas.
notes.body_html:
Hello Kushagra,

Greetings from PharmEasy!

I understand your concern with regard to the price issue. I will surely assist you with this.

I would like to inform you that we are running the "best pricing feature", which includes a product-level discount, coupon code discount, Pharmeasy credits, and loyalty cashback (for customers enrolled in the Plus program). 

Please note, when you search for any product on our portal that time the price of that product or medicine shows with the product-level discount, coupon code discount, Pharmeasy credits, and loyalty cashback (for customers enrolled in the Plus program). After adding that product to your cart, the basic product level discount will be shown without the coupon code discount. Under your cart, medicines you need to apply the coupon code to get the same discount benefits.

For any further assistance, please reach out to us through our support channels in the App or website listed in the 'Need Help' section.

Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Stay Healthy.

Regards,
Devdas.

notes.body_html:
Hello Rupam,

Greetings from PharmEasy!

notes.body: Hello Sayan,     Greetings from PharmEasy!  ​   I understand your concern is regarding the medicine deleted from your order.    With regards to your order #657027333410693120-75743, I see the requested medicine VITCHEW CZ ORANGE FLAVOUR SUGAR FREE STRIP OF 15 CHEWABLE TABLETS was unavailable with our partner retailer.   ​   I see the requested medicine ​DOXT SL 100MG STRIP OF 10 CAPSULES was unavailable with our partner retailer. Hence, it was replaced with ​DOXT SL 100MG STRIP OF 15 CAPSULES as a packaging variant to fulfill your requirements.     Please note, at the time of placing the order, the requested medicine was available in limited quantity, and you were able to add medicines to the order. Once the medicine was added to your order, our Partner Retailer tried to arrange the medicine from every possible source.   I request you to place a new order after 7 days for the required medicine. As our retailer restocks the medicines every 7 days. If the medicine is still unavailable, I would request that you reach out to us. We will highlight your concern to the Partner retailer.  ​   Please be informed, The refund for the difference in amount will be initiated once the invoice for this order is generated. We request you to kindly wait until the invoice is prepared.  ​   For any further assistance, please reach out to us through our support channels in the App or website listed in the 'Need Help' section.     Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Stay Healthy.     Regards,  Manisha
notes.body_html:
Hello Sayan,

Greetings from PharmEasy!
​
I understand your concern is regarding the medicine deleted from your order. 

With regards to your order #657027333410693120-75743, I see the requested medicine VITCHEW CZ ORANGE FLAVOUR SUGAR FREE STRIP OF 15 CHEWABLE TABLETS was unavailable with our partner retailer. 
​
I see the requested medicine ​DOXT SL 100MG STRIP OF 10 CAPSULES was unavailable with our partner retailer. Hence, it was replaced with ​DOXT SL 100MG STRIP OF 15 CAPSULES as a packaging variant to fulfill your requirements.

Please note, at the time of placing the order, the requested medicine was available in limited quantity, and you were able to add medicines to the order. Once the medicine was added to your order, our Partner Retailer tried to arrange the medicine from every possible source.

I request you to place a new order after 7 days for the required medicine. As our retailer restocks the medicines every 7 days. If the medicine is still unavailable, I would request that you reach out to us. We will highlight your concern to the Partner retailer.
​
Please be informed, The refund for the difference in amount will be initiated once the invoice for this order is generated. We request you to kindly wait until the invoice is prepared.
​
For any further assistance, please reach out to us through our support channels in the App or website listed in the 'Need Help' section.

Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Stay Healthy.

Regards,
Manisha

helpdesk_ticket.description:
Dear PharmEasy Team,

This email is to register my strongest possible complaint regarding the
absolute mismanagement and irresponsible behaviour shown in handling my
medicine order. Order No. - 656552369997107200-64514-HAU

I placed my monthly medicine order well in advance and I am also a PLUS
Member for the entire year. Despite this, PharmEasy first committed that
the order would be delivered on 10 December. On the same day, it again
showed delivery by 10 PM. Now, after crossing the promised time, it
suddenly shows 12 December, 10 PM as the new tentative delivery time.

Let me be very clear:
I do not have medicines left for tomorrow, and these are BP medications —
delays are not a joke. I planned everything based on PharmEasy’s own
committed delivery dates. If I now have to go out and purchase these
medicines separately because of your team’s inefficiency, then what exactly
is the “benefit” of my Plus Membership? What am I paying for?

Your team shipped the package late, and on top of that, you handed it over
to a courier partner that reached the destination city 24+ hours ago but
has still not delivered. Now that same courier partner needs another two
days. This is nothing but a complete breakdown of responsibility,
accountability, and basic customer service.

This is not just inconvenience — this is harassment.
In many households, especially with geriatric patients, children stay in
one city and parents stay in another. Medicines are essential, not
optional. When someone orders medicines days in advance and you still fail
to deliver them even after your own estimated delivery date and time has
passed, it reflects an alarming lack of professionalism.

And please do not attempt to compensate this delay by adding ₹50–₹100 to my
wallet balance — that is meaningless and insulting. I am a Plus Member.
Wallet credits don’t solve the problem because medicine purchases have
clear restrictions and cannot be manipulated the way grocery or retail
items are. So kindly don’t pretend to “compensate” customers with an amount
that has zero real use.

I expect immediate action on the following:

1. Deliver my medicines within the next few hours — not in 2 more days.


2. Explain why the delivery date was changed twice without any
accountability.


3. Explain why you chose such an irresponsible courier partner.


4. Provide a clear statement from your logistics team and higher management
about how you plan to fix this issue permanently, not temporarily.



If PharmEasy cannot ensure timely delivery even after a customer pays for
Plus Membership and orders days in advance, then this raises a serious
question about the reliability and future of your service. Also I want to

helpdesk_ticket.subject: Extremely Irresponsible Delay in Medicine Delivery – Serious Complaint Against PharmEasy & Its Courier Partner
helpdesk_ticket.description_html:
Dear PharmEasy Team,

This email is to register my strongest possible complaint regarding the absolute mismanagement and irresponsible behaviour shown in handling my medicine order. Order No. - 656552369997107200-64514-HAU

I placed my monthly medicine order well in advance and I am also a PLUS Member for the entire year. Despite this, PharmEasy first committed that the order would be delivered on 10 December. On the same day, it again showed delivery by 10 PM. Now, after crossing the promised time, it suddenly shows 12 December, 10 PM as the new tentative delivery time.

Let me be very clear:
I do not have medicines left for tomorrow, and these are BP medications — delays are not a joke. I planned everything based on PharmEasy’s own committed delivery dates. If I now have to go out and purchase these medicines separately because of your team’s inefficiency, then what exactly is the “benefit” of my Plus Membership? What am I paying for?

Your team shipped the package late, and on top of that, you handed it over to a courier partner that reached the destination city 24+ hours ago but has still not delivered. Now that same courier partner needs another two days. This is nothing but a complete breakdown of responsibility, accountability, and basic customer service.

This is not just inconvenience — this is harassment.
In many households, especially with geriatric patients, children stay in one city and parents stay in another. Medicines are essential, not optional. When someone orders medicines days in advance and you still fail to deliver them even after your own estimated delivery date and time has passed, it reflects an alarming lack of professionalism.

And please do not attempt to compensate this delay by adding ₹50–₹100 to my wallet balance — that is meaningless and insulting. I am a Plus Member. Wallet credits don’t solve the problem because medicine purchases have clear restrictions and cannot be manipulated the way grocery or retail items are. So kindly don’t pretend to “compensate” customers with an amount that has zero real use.

I expect immediate action on the following:

1. Deliver my medicines within the next few hours — not in 2 more days.


2. Explain why the delivery date was changed twice without any accountability.


3. Explain why you chose such an irresponsible courier partner.


4. Provide a clear statement from your logistics team and higher management about how you plan to fix this issue permanently, not temporarily.



If PharmEasy cannot ensure timely delivery even after a customer pays for Plus Membership and orders days in advance, then this raises a serious question about the reliability and future of your service. Also I want to say that, henceforth if I observe that, any of my order is dispatched or you have assigned that Shiprocket as courier partner , I shall cancel the order after the pick up.


I look forward to an urgent and genuine response — not an automated apology and not a useless wallet credit. I have attached all the screenshot

Regards,
Prateik Sen
Registered Mobile Number: 99072 15796 
Order ID- 656552369997107200-64514-HAU
Tracking ID: BSRC4375143420

notes.body: Hello Vikas,     Greetings from PharmEasy!      This email is in regard to your concern raised with us. I will surely assist you.     I regret to inform you that our application currently does not have an option to delete or remove saved card details. I sincerely apologize for the inconvenience caused.  ​  Please be assured that your feedback has been duly noted and will be shared with the relevant team for future improvements.     ​I have requested our Payment team to delete the card details from your PharmEasy profile. You can expect an update within 24 - 48 hours. As soon as we receive an update, we will notify you by email.     ​I appreciate your patience and understanding in the meantime.     Regards,  Sandhya Nackwal
notes.body_html:
Hello Vikas,

Greetings from PharmEasy! 

This email is in regard to your concern raised with us. I will surely assist you.

I regret to inform you that our application currently does not have an option to delete or remove saved card details. I sincerely apologize for the inconvenience caused.

Please be assured that your feedback has been duly noted and will be shared with the relevant team for future improvements.

​I appreciate your patience and understanding in the meantime.

Regards,
Sandhya Nackwal

notes.body_html:
Hello Navleen Shah,

Greetings from PharmEasy! 

With reference to the email regarding Order ID: 6250526, we have been trying to reach you on your registered contact number (9016717718). However, our calls have gone unanswered.
Hence requesting you to kindly revert us with your convenient time or alternate number to assist you further.

We regret to inform you that the assigned phlebotomist failed to visit as per the scheduled time due to which you have faced the inconvenience & based on the seen lapses we assure you that the corrective action will be taken as per company policy to avoid such inconvenience in future.

Further we would like to inform you that as per OTOF policy, credited cashback of Rs. 1500/-  in your PharmEasy wallet with 60 days validity.
Below are the usage criteria for your reference

You can pay 5% of your medicine order value with PharmEasy Credits.
You can pay 50% of your Lab Test Booking value with PharmEasy Credits.

Please refer this link for more clarification  : http://campaigns.pharmeasy.net/otof-tnc/

We sincerely regret the inconvenience experienced by you and shall be happy to provide you with a hassle free service in future.
For any further assistance, please reach out to us through our support channels, in the App or website, listed in the 'Need Help' section. 

Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Have a great day ahead!

Regards,
Reshma Kokare
PharmEasy

notes.body:
Respected Sir,


I had booked a lab test with PharmEasy on 11th December 2025, which was prepaid. The lab technician arrived over 2 hours late. My blood sample was finally collected at 8:40 AM, after which the technician asked me to change the test timing in the system, stating that it was not mapped to him. I could clearly see his name in the app; he was simply trying to manipulate the timing to cover his delay.


When I contacted your call centre, I was explicitly told that the full amount would be refunded, as the test was prepaid and the service was not delivered as promised.


However, no refund was processed to my original payment method. Instead, ₹1550 was forcefully added to my wallet, which I cannot use freely. This is not a refund. Your own customer support confirmed that the amount should have been returned to the base payment method, yet this was not done.


I am an old and regular PharmEasy customer. You can verify my complete history against my registered number 9979968044. This experience has been extremely disappointing and unacceptable.


If PharmEasy has no intention of refunding customers properly, then do not mislead or make false commitments, either on the app or through your call centre. Promising one thing and doing another amounts to misrepresentation and harassment.


This incident has completely shaken my trust in your service, and I will not forget the inconvenience and stress caused due to your team’s negligence and dishonesty.


I expect an immediate reversal of ₹1550 to my original payment method, not wallet credits.


Awaiting urgent resolution.


Regards,
Navleen

notes.body: Hello Abhimanyu,     Greetings from PharmEasy!  ​  This email is in regards to the concern raised about your order #657067953337733120-33513.Please accept my sincere apologies for the inconvenience caused.  ​  As per update received from our team, please be informed that all medicines were packed and delivered to you in proper and good condition as checked with our warehouse team. However, the return medicine seal is in opened condition so neither refund is possible nor product will be returned as per policy,      Your understanding is highly appreciated in this regard.     Please be informed that the update was shared with you after a thorough check.  ​  We are marking the ticket as resolved. If you have any queries, please feel free to get back to us.  ​  For any further assistance, please reach out to us through our support channels, on the App or website, listed in the "Need Help" section.  ​  Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Have a great day ahead!  ​  Regards,  PharmEasy
notes.body_html:
Hello Abhimanyu,

Greetings from PharmEasy!
​
This email is in regards to the concern raised about your order #657067953337733120-33513.Please accept my sincere apologies for the inconvenience caused.
​
As per update received from our team, please be informed that all medicines were packed and delivered to you in proper and good condition as checked with our warehouse team. However, the return medicine seal is in opened condition so neither refund is possible nor product will be returned as per policy, 
 
Your understanding is highly appreciated in this regard.

For any further assistance, please reach out to us through our support channels, on the App or website, listed in the "Need Help" section.

Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Have a great day ahead!

PharmEasy

notes.body: Hello Jaswanth,     Greetings from PharmEasy!     I understand your concern with regard to the order ID #656542687499157504-28030. I apologize for the inconvenience caused to you with your order, and I will surely assist you with this.     As per the records, the order was assigned for a doctor consultation. Our partnered doctors tried multiple times to reach out to you for the consultation. However, they were unable to connect with you.     I am arranging a doctor's callback on your registered mobile number. You will be receiving a call within 2 hours. I would request that you answer the call so that the order can be processed further. I assure you the order will be processed with priority once the doctor consultation is completed.      You can also reach out to us on 080-46161170 for your doctor consultation. I appreciate your patience in the meantime.

Regards,
Sandhya Nackwal

notes.body: Hello Durgesh,     Greetings from PharmEasy!     This email is with regards to your order #655656183862751232-14563, we apologize for the inconvenience caused to you with your order.     As per update received from our team, please be informed that we have raised a return request for 01 quantity of theFAST&UP MAN EXTEND | TESTOFEN FENUGREEK EXTRACT -PACK OF 20 EFFERVESCENT TABLETS FIZZY PEACH FLAVOR   on 15th Deember 2025. Please be informed, items being returned should be in their original manufacturer’s packaging with labels and barcode intact.     Please note that the medicine will be collected within 48 hours from the day the request is raised. Once the medicine is returned, it will be verified by our partner retailer at the store. The refund will be processed and initiated within 5 business days. Also, once the refund is initiated it would reflect in your original source account within 7-10 business days.     We appreciate your patience in the meantime.     We are marking the ticket as resolved. If you have any queries, please feel free to get back to us.     For any further assistance, please reopen this ticket or reach out to us through our support channels, in the App or website, listed in the 'Need Help' section.     Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Have a great day ahead!     Regards,  PharmEasy
notes.body_html:
Hello Durgesh,

Greetings from PharmEasy!
 
This email is with regards to your order #655656183862751232-14563, we apologize for the inconvenience caused to you with your order.

As per update received from our team, please be informed that we have raised a return request for 01 quantity of theFAST&UP MAN EXTEND | TESTOFEN FENUGREEK EXTRACT -PACK OF 20 EFFERVESCENT TABLETS FIZZY PEACH FLAVOR   on 15th Deember 2025. Please be informed, items being returned should be in their original manufacturer’s packaging with labels and barcode intact.
 
Please note that the medicine will be collected within 48 hours from the day the request is raised. Once the medicine is returned, it will be verified by our partner retailer at the store. The refund will be processed and initiated within 5 business days. Also, once the refund is initiated it would reflect in your original source account within 7-10 business days.
 
We appreciate your patience in the meantime.
 
We are marking the ticket as resolved. If you have any queries, please feel free to get back to us.
 
For any further assistance, please reopen this ticket or reach out to us through our support channels, in the App or website, listed in the 'Need Help' section.
 
Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Have a great day ahead!
 
Regards,
PharmEasy

notes.body: Hello Harsh,     Greetings from PharmEasy!     I am sorry to hear that you wish to delete your account with PharmEasy. Please note that currently, we do not have a facility to delete the account from our database; however, we can deactivate your account. We will be unable to activate it later, and it will be deactivated permanently.     Once your request has been processed in the system, our agent will call within 24 to 48 hours on a registered mobile number and confirm if you have requested account deactivation. After verification, an OTP will be sent to your registered mobile number.  Once the OTP is verified, the agent will go ahead and deactivate your account       Kindly confirm so that we can proceed with the request.     Awaiting your earliest response.     Regards,  Habiba
notes.body_html:
Hello Harsh,

Greetings from PharmEasy!

I am sorry to hear that you wish to delete your account with PharmEasy. Please note that currently, we do not have a facility to delete the account from our database; however, we can deactivate your account. We will be unable to activate it later, and it will be deactivated permanently.

Once your request has been processed in the system, our agent will call within 24 to 48 hours on a registered mobile number and confirm if you have requested account deactivation. After verification, an OTP will be sent to your registered mobile number.  Once the OTP is verified, the agent will go ahead and deactivate your account  

Kindly confirm so that we can proceed with the request.

Awaiting your earliest response.

Regards,
Habiba

notes.body: Hello Sujit,    Greetings from PharmEasy!     A refund of Rs. 5505.2 is initiated to your account now. Post initiation, the refund will be credited to your source account within 3-5 business days. Please note that Saturday, Sunday, and bank holidays are not included in this. A partial refund of Rs. 477.80 was already initiated on 09.12.2025. Please refuse to accept the order if an attempt is made for delivery.   For any further assistance, please reach out to us through our support channels on the app or website listed in the "Need Help" section.  Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Stay Safe.  Regards, Grievance Officer HelpDesk.
notes.body_html:
Hello Sujit,

Greetings from PharmEasy!

A refund of Rs. 5505.2 is initiated to your account now. Post initiation, the refund will be credited to your source account within 3-5 business days. Please note that Saturday, Sunday, and bank holidays are not included in this. A partial refund of Rs. 477.80 was already initiated on 09.12.2025. Please refuse to accept the order if an attempt is made for delivery.

For any further assistance, please reach out to us through our support channels on the app or website listed in the "Need Help" section.

Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Stay Safe.

Regards,
Grievance Officer HelpDesk.

notes.body: Hello Vijay,     Greetings from PharmEasy!     This email is with reference to the concern raised for order #656675576433414144-17197.     We have received an update from our logistics team. As per the update, your order has been delivered on 09 December 2025,10:31 AM. Please accept my sincere apology for the inconvenience caused to you. We have shared the required feedback with the delivery agent and we will make sure that such instances are not repeated in the future.     Please consider this as a one-off instance as we aim to provide the best of services to our customers and such instances are very rare.     We are marking the ticket as resolved. PharmEasy looks forward to bettering your experience in the future.     For any further assistance, please reopen this ticket or reach out to us through our support channels, in the App or website, listed in the 'Need Help' section.      Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Have a great day ahead!     Regards,   PharmEasy
notes.body_html:
Hello Vijay,

Greetings from PharmEasy!
 
This email is with reference to the concern raised for order #656675576433414144-17197.
 
We have received an update from our logistics team. As per the update, your order has been delivered on 09 December 2025,10:31 AM. Please accept my sincere apology for the inconvenience caused to you. We have shared the required feedback with the delivery agent and we will make sure that such instances are not repeated in the future.
 
Please consider this as a one-off instance as we aim to provide the best of services to our customers and such instances are very rare.

We are marking the ticket as resolved. PharmEasy looks forward to bettering your experience in the future.

For any further assistance, please reopen this ticket or reach out to us through our support channels, in the App or website, listed in the 'Need Help' section. 
 
Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Have a great day ahead!

Regards, 
PharmEasy

notes.body: Hello Ajay,   Greetings from PharmEasy!  With reference to your personal data deletion request, I am sorry to inform you that we are unable to delete the account from our database. As we have to show all transactions or interactions, past or present when asked for by relevant Government authorities.    However, kindly confirm with us if you wish to deactivate the account or want to stop receiving promotional SMS/Emails so that we can check and do the needful at the earliest.  Let me inform you that, once the account is deactivated then we cannot process any request or reactivate the account. Once confirmed our team will reach out to complete the account deactivation process on a registered mobile number to confirm if you requested account deactivation. If yes, OTP will be generated and will be sent to your registered mobile number. Once the OTP is shared by you to the team then will go ahead and block your account.   Awaiting your response.         Regards,  Devdas.
notes.body_html:
Hello Ajay,

Greetings from PharmEasy!

With reference to your personal data deletion request, I am sorry to inform you that we are unable to delete the account from our database. As we have to show all transactions or interactions, past or present when asked for by relevant Government authorities. 
 
However, kindly confirm with us if you wish to deactivate the account or want to stop receiving promotional SMS/Emails so that we can check and do the needful at the earliest.

Let me inform you that, once the account is deactivated then we cannot process any request or reactivate the account. Once confirmed our team will reach out to complete the account deactivation process on a registered mobile number to confirm if you requested account deactivation. If yes, OTP will be generated and will be sent to your registered mobile number. Once the OTP is shared by you to the team then will go ahead and block your account. 

Awaiting your response.

Regards,
Devdas.

Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Stay Healthy.     Regards,  Manisha

notes.body:
I am writing to formally request the immediate deletion of my entire
account, including all medical records, historical reports, personal data,
and transaction history associated with my registered details (Mobile:
9665681683 / Email: ajaymeq@gmail.com).

I have previously requested this deletion, but your support team refused
without providing a valid statutory justification.

I. Legal Basis for My Request

I am exercising my rights under the following Indian statutes:

1. Right to Erasure (Digital Personal Data Protection Act, 2023): Under
Section 12 of the DPDP Act, I have the right to request the erasure of my
personal data.

2. Withdrawal of Consent (IT Rules, 2011): Under Rule 5(7) of the
Information Technology (Reasonable Security Practices and Procedures and
Sensitive Personal Data or Information) Rules, 2011, I hereby withdraw my
consent for the processing, storage, and retention of any and all sensitive
personal data associated with my history on your platform.

II. Demand for Clarification or Compliance

If you refuse to delete my complete history, you are legally required to
provide a specific justification. A vague statement that you "cannot"
delete the data is legally insufficient.

If you claim you are required to retain specific parts of my history under
the National Medical Commission (NMC) Regulations or for tax purposes, I
demand that you:

1. Cite the specific statute and section you are relying upon for retention.

2. Confirm the exact retention period after which this data will be
permanently purged.

3. Immediately restrict all processing of my data. Confirm in writing that
my account has been deactivated and my data moved to a "blocked" or

notes.body: Hello Ajay,     Greetings from PharmEasy!  With reference to your personal data deletion request.  We acknowledge your request and would like to clarify that by utilizing our services, you have consented to our Privacy Policy, which outlines the terms under which your data may be collected, processed, and retained. As detailed in our Privacy Policy, particularly in clause 1(a), “We may store and process prescriptions, treatment notes, recommendations and other data generated by Medical Practitioners on or through the Platform, and data shared by third parties such as diagnostics related information; prescription related information etc and may retain such material for Our records for the duration of You availing the Services or for any such period required or permitted under applicable law.”  This includes, but is not limited to, the timelines specified in the Drugs Rules, 1945 and the CGST Act, 2017.  We have taken cognizance of your request with respect to deletion of your data shared on PharmEasy Platform. While we take steps to cease to process your data, please note that certain information may still be retained if it is (i) mandated by law (ii) requested or ordered by a competent court of law/judicial authority/ governmental or regulatory body or; (iii) is required to safeguard and defend the company, its affiliates, group companies and service providers in the event of any future litigations or disputes.  However, kindly confirm with us if you wish to deactivate the account. Let me inform you that, once the account is deactivated then we cannot process any request or reactivate the account. Once confirmed, our team will reach out to complete the account deactivation process on a registered mobile number to confirm if you requested account deactivation. If yes, OTP will be generated and will be sent to your registered mobile number. Once the OTP is shared by you to the team, we will go ahead and block the customer's account.   Awaiting your response.  Regards,      Habiba
notes.body_html:
Hello Ajay,

Greetings from PharmEasy!

With reference to your personal data deletion request.

We acknowledge your request and would like to clarify that by utilizing our services, you have consented to our Privacy Policy, which outlines the terms under which your data may be collected, processed, and retained. As detailed in our Privacy Policy, particularly in clause 1(a), “We may store and process prescriptions, treatment notes, recommendations and other data generated by Medical Practitioners on or through the Platform, and data shared by third parties such as diagnostics related information; prescription related information etc and may retain such material for Our records for the duration of You availing the Services or for any such period required or permitted under applicable law.”  This includes, but is not limited to, the timelines specified in the Drugs Rules, 1945 and the CGST Act, 2017.

We have taken cognizance of your request with respect to deletion of your data shared on PharmEasy Platform. While we take steps to cease to process your data, please note that certain information may still be retained if it is (i) mandated by law (ii) requested or ordered by a competent court of law/judicial authority/ governmental or regulatory body or; (iii) is required to safeguard and defend the company, its affiliates, group companies and service providers in the event of any future litigations or disputes.

However, kindly confirm with us if you wish to deactivate the account. Let me inform you that, once the account is deactivated then we cannot process any request or reactivate the account. Once confirmed, our team will reach out to complete the account deactivation process on a registered mobile number to confirm if you requested account deactivation. If yes, OTP will be generated and will be sent to your registered mobile number. Once the OTP is shared by you to the team, we will go ahead and block the customer's account. 

Awaiting your response.

Regards, 
Habiba

notes.body:
Hi

I am in receipt of your email regarding the retention of my data under the
Drugs Rules, 1945 and CGST Act, 2017.

While I disagree with the necessity of retaining diagnostic data
indefinitely, I understand your position regarding statutory liability.
Therefore, to resolve this matter, I consent to the Deactivation of my
account, provided strictly that you adhere to the following data protection
conditions to safeguard my privacy:

1. Move to "Cold Storage" (Archival Only):

Upon deactivation, my data must be moved to a secure, offline archive
("Cold Storage") meant solely for legal compliance. It must be strictly
restricted from your active database, marketing algorithms, and accessible
only to your Legal/Compliance Nodal Officer. Front-line support staff must
not have the ability to view or retrieve my records.

2. Specific Revocation of Third-Party Consent:

I hereby explicitly withdraw my consent for sharing my data with any third
parties, including but not limited to insurance companies, TPA (Third Party
Administrators), or data aggregators.

• Any future request for my data from a third party should be rejected
unless it is accompanied by a specific Court Order or a direct statutory
mandate.

• A generic "authorization letter" or background check request is not
sufficient grounds to release my archived data.

3. Data Minimization:

Please ensure my mobile number and email are removed from any searchable
"User Search" index used by your internal teams, so that my profile does
not appear in casual system lookups.

Please generate the OTP for account deactivation and confirm that these
privacy restrictions have been noted in your system logs.
Thanks
notes.body_html:
Hi
I am in receipt of your email regarding the retention of my data under the Drugs Rules, 1945 and CGST Act, 2017.
While I disagree with the necessity of retaining diagnostic data indefinitely, I understand your position regarding statutory liability. Therefore, to resolve this matter, I consent to the Deactivation of my account, provided strictly that you adhere to the following data protection conditions to safeguard my privacy:
1. Move to "Cold Storage" (Archival Only):
Upon deactivation, my data must be moved to a secure, offline archive ("Cold Storage") meant solely for legal compliance. It must be strictly restricted from your active database, marketing algorithms, and accessible only to your Legal/Compliance Nodal Officer. Front-line support staff must not have the ability to view or retrieve my records.
2. Specific Revocation of Third-Party Consent:
I hereby explicitly withdraw my consent for sharing my data with any third parties, including but not limited to insurance companies, TPA (Third Party Administrators), or data aggregators.
• Any future request for my data from a third party should be rejected unless it is accompanied by a specific Court Order or a direct statutory mandate.
• A generic "authorization letter" or background check request is not sufficient grounds to release my archived data.
3. Data Minimization:
Please ensure my mobile number and email are removed from any searchable "User Search" index used by your internal teams, so that my profile does not appear in casual system lookups.
Please generate the OTP for account deactivation and confirm that these privacy restrictions have been noted in your system logs.
Thanks

India spends *billions of dollars* on public health every year, yet *millions
of citizens* still don’t know about Ayushman Bharat, ABHA, e-Sanjeevani,
Ni-kshay, POSHAN, Jan Aushadhi and other life-changing schemes.
The problem isn’t lack of schemes.
The problem is *access*.

To fix this, the answer lies not inside hospitals — but *inside India’s
chemist network*.
------------------------------
*??? ???? ???????? ?????? ??????? ??
?????: ??.?? ???? ????????*

• *10.50 lakh chemist shops*
• *50+ crore monthly bills*
• *50 lakh employees*
• *80% of Indian families* visit a chemist before a hospital
• And Marg ERP already powers *1.75 lakh chemists*, creating *15 crore
patient touchpoints per month*

This is India’s largest, most trusted, most frequent healthcare touchpoint.
And now, this network is transforming into India’s *Universal Health
Gateway*.
------------------------------
*??? ?????????? ?? ???? — ?????’? ???
??????? ??????*

We are integrating a *Healthcare QR Code* on every chemist bill.
One scan gives every Indian access to:
*Govt Schemes*

Ayushman Bharat | ABHA ID | Jan Aushadhi | Ni-kshay | CoWIN | e-Sanjeevani
| POSHAN

₹100 doctor consultations | ₹60 AI face scans | Digital prescriptions |
Chronic care | Insurance | Lab tests (upcoming)

For the first time, government programs reach citizens *exactly where they
already go — their neighbourhood chemist*.
------------------------------
*? ?????????? ?????????? ?? ?????????,
????????, ?????? ??????????*

If your organisation has *any solution that can improve the life of even 1
citizen*,
we can help you reach *140 crore Indians*.

We welcome companies from:

• Diagnostics & preventive health
• Insurance & micro-insurance
• Pharma & generic medicines
• AI health analytics
• Medical devices
• Nutrition & mother–child health
• Emergency response
• CSR health programs
• Digital health & patient engagement
• NGOs working in public health

With *15 crore monthly patient interactions*, the Healthcare QR Code is the
fastest national-scale delivery channel for meaningful health solutions.
------------------------------
*??? ???????*

• 10 lakh+ chemists become digital health partners
• Public schemes reach every doorstep
• Affordable care becomes universal
• AI screening becomes mainstream
• Digital records become household assets
• India builds a *connected, inclusive, preventive* health system

This is not an upgrade.
This is *India’s healthcare leap*.
------------------------------
*???? ??????? ?????? — ???????? ???
??????? ???? ????? ?????.*


*If you can contribute, collaborate, or innovate — we welcome you. Let’s
build the future of healthcare together.*

helpdesk_ticket.description_html:
𝐈𝐧𝐝𝐢𝐚 𝐧𝐞𝐞𝐝𝐬 𝐚 𝐧𝐞𝐰 𝐡𝐞𝐚𝐥𝐭𝐡𝐜𝐚𝐫𝐞 𝐠𝐚𝐭𝐞𝐰𝐚𝐲 — 𝐚𝐧𝐝 𝐰𝐞’𝐫𝐞 𝐛𝐮𝐢𝐥𝐝𝐢𝐧𝐠 𝐢𝐭 𝐭𝐨𝐠𝐞𝐭𝐡𝐞𝐫.
India spends billions of dollars on public health every year, yet millions of citizens still don’t know about Ayushman Bharat, ABHA, e-Sanjeevani, Ni-kshay, POSHAN, Jan Aushadhi and other life-changing schemes.
The problem isn’t lack of schemes.
The problem is access.
To fix this, the answer lies not inside hospitals — but inside India’s chemist network.

𝐓𝐡𝐞 𝐌𝐨𝐬𝐭 𝐏𝐨𝐰𝐞𝐫𝐟𝐮𝐥 𝐇𝐞𝐚𝐥𝐭𝐡 𝐍𝐞𝐭𝐰𝐨𝐫𝐤 𝐈𝐧 𝐈𝐧𝐝𝐢𝐚: 𝟏𝟎.𝟓𝟎 𝐥𝐚𝐤𝐡 𝐜𝐡𝐞𝐦𝐢𝐬𝐭𝐬

• 10.50 lakh chemist shops
• 50+ crore monthly bills
• 50 lakh employees
• 80% of Indian families visit a chemist before a hospital
• And Marg ERP already powers 1.75 lakh chemists, creating 15 crore patient touchpoints per month
This is India’s largest, most trusted, most frequent healthcare touchpoint.
And now, this network is transforming into India’s Universal Health Gateway.

𝐓𝐡𝐞 𝐇𝐞𝐚𝐥𝐭𝐡𝐜𝐚𝐫𝐞 𝐐𝐑 𝐂𝐨𝐝𝐞 — 𝐈𝐧𝐝𝐢𝐚’𝐬 𝐧𝐞𝐰 𝐝𝐢𝐠𝐢𝐭𝐚𝐥 𝐛𝐫𝐢𝐝𝐠𝐞

We are integrating a Healthcare QR Code on every chemist bill.
One scan gives every Indian access to:

Govt Schemes

Ayushman Bharat | ABHA ID | Jan Aushadhi | Ni-kshay | CoWIN | e-Sanjeevani | POSHAN

Healthcare Services

₹100 doctor consultations | ₹60 AI face scans | Digital prescriptions | Chronic care | Insurance | Lab tests (upcoming)
For the first time, government programs reach citizens exactly where they already go — their neighbourhood chemist.

𝐀 𝐍𝐚𝐭𝐢𝐨𝐧𝐰𝐢𝐝𝐞 𝐈𝐧𝐯𝐢𝐭𝐚𝐭𝐢𝐨𝐧 𝐭𝐨 𝐂𝐨𝐦𝐩𝐚𝐧𝐢𝐞𝐬, 𝐒𝐭𝐚𝐫𝐭𝐮𝐩𝐬, 𝐇𝐞𝐚𝐥𝐭𝐡 𝐈𝐧𝐧𝐨𝐯𝐚𝐭𝐨𝐫𝐬

If your organisation has any solution that can improve the life of even 1 citizen,
we can help you reach 140 crore Indians.
We welcome companies from:
• Diagnostics & preventive health
• Insurance & micro-insurance
• Pharma & generic medicines
• AI health analytics
• Medical devices
• Nutrition & mother–child health
• Emergency response
• CSR health programs
• Digital health & patient engagement
• NGOs working in public health
With 15 crore monthly patient interactions, the Healthcare QR Code is the fastest national-scale delivery channel for meaningful health solutions.

𝐓𝐡𝐞 𝐏𝐫𝐨𝐦𝐢𝐬𝐞

• 10 lakh+ chemists become digital health partners
• Public schemes reach every doorstep
• Affordable care becomes universal
• AI screening becomes mainstream
• Digital records become household assets
• India builds a connected, inclusive, preventive health system
This is not an upgrade.
This is India’s healthcare leap.

𝐌𝐚𝐫𝐠 𝐃𝐢𝐠𝐢𝐭𝐚𝐥 𝐇𝐞𝐚𝐥𝐭𝐡 — 𝐁𝐮𝐢𝐥𝐝𝐢𝐧𝐠 𝐭𝐡𝐞 𝐆𝐚𝐭𝐞𝐰𝐚𝐲 𝐭𝐡𝐚𝐭 𝐈𝐧𝐝𝐢𝐚 𝐧𝐞𝐞𝐝𝐬.

If you can contribute, collaborate, or innovate — we welcome you.
Let’s build the future of healthcare together.

Thanks & Regards

Thakur Anup Singh

Founder & CMD

MARG ERP LTD.

Plot No. 7, Wazirpur Press Area, Opp, Netaji Subhash Place, Delhi-110035 (INDIA)
+91-11-30969600, 66969600
www.margerp.com

     Who We Are?

Request you to resolve this at the earliest.

notes.body: Hello,  Greetings from PharmEasy!   I understand your concern with regard to the order ID #654748460354371584-71397. I apologize for the inconvenience caused to you with your order.         We have already highlighted the issue to the Escalation team. We will respond with the update as soon as we receive any from them.     Please be informed that we are currently unable to offer a replacement for the medicine or product, as this facility is not available. However, we can process a return after the verification process.     You can refer to the ticket Id #22257193. I appreciate your patience in the meantime.     Regards,  Neeha
notes.body_html:
Hello,

Greetings from PharmEasy!

I understand your concern with regard to the order ID #654748460354371584-71397. I apologize for the inconvenience caused to you with your order.

We have already highlighted the issue to the Escalation team. We will respond with the update as soon as we receive any from them.

Please be informed that we are currently unable to offer a replacement for the medicine or product, as this facility is not available. However, we can process a return after the verification process.

You can refer to the ticket Id #22257193. I appreciate your patience in the meantime.

Regards,
Neeha

I would request you to kindly help me with the following information for verification purposes so that I can assist you further.   A Part -Mandatory Information (Any ONE)-  1. Registered contact number  2. Registered email address   AND/OR    B Part-Any ONE of the below:   1) Order ID  2) 60% of the Delivery Address (Flat no., Building Name/number, Street name, Location)  3) Patient Name  4) One of the ordered medicine on current (if applicable) / past orders  5) Mode of Payment for last order   Receipt of the details will help me to assist you better.  ​   ​Kindly share the area pin code so that we can assist you further.   Awaiting your response.   Regards,  Manisha
notes.body_html:
Hello Sreenivasan,

Greetings from PharmEasy! 

I will surely assist you with this. However, I am unable to fetch your profile details with ​vasan5479@gmail.com. I would request you to kindly help me with the following information for verification purposes so that I can assist you further.

A Part -Mandatory Information (Any ONE)-
1. Registered contact number
2. Registered email address

AND/OR 

B Part-Any ONE of the below: 
1) Order ID
2) 60% of the Delivery Address (Flat no., Building Name/number, Street name, Location)
3) Patient Name
4) One of the ordered medicine on current (if applicable) / past orders
5) Mode of Payment for last order

Receipt of the details will help me to assist you better.
​
​Kindly share the area pin code so that we can assist you further.

Awaiting your response.

Regards,
Manisha

notes.body: Hello Louis,        Greetings from PharmEasy!     I tried to reach you earlier today at 07:05 PM on 9961607983, but unfortunately, I was unable to connect with you.     I understand your concern with regard to the order Id #657442410942238720-76736. We apologize if you felt inconvenienced by the confirmation call after your order.      The purpose of this call is to verify medicine details and availability so that your order can be fulfilled quickly and correctly. Based on availability, our pharmacists may suggest substitutes or offer related products to support smooth delivery.  Any prescription medicine is provided strictly in compliance with a valid prescription from a registered medical practitioner.    ​   However, we have stopped the substitute or health care product calls. For future orders, you will receive only a confirmation call to verify the medicine order.   ​   For any further assistance, please reach out to us through our support channels in the App or website listed in the 'Need Help' section.   Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Stay Healthy.     Regards,  PharmEasy
notes.body_html:
Hello Louis,

Greetings from PharmEasy!

I tried to reach you earlier today at 07:05 PM on 9961607983, but unfortunately, I was unable to connect with you.

I understand your concern with regard to the order Id #657442410942238720-76736. We apologize if you felt inconvenienced by the confirmation call after your order. 

The purpose of this call is to verify medicine details and availability so that your order can be fulfilled quickly and correctly. Based on availability, our pharmacists may suggest substitutes or offer related products to support smooth delivery.

Any prescription medicine is provided strictly in compliance with a valid prescription from a registered medical practitioner.  
​
However, we have stopped the substitute or health care product calls. For future orders, you will receive only a confirmation call to verify the medicine order. 
​
For any further assistance, please reach out to us through our support channels in the App or website listed in the 'Need Help' section.

Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Stay Healthy.

Regards,
PharmEasy
